Lyric:
[by:柠檬味海风Sound]
[00:15.93]Don't feel home on this 3d plane
[00:17.65]I can feel the energy running through my veins 
[00:19.64]Blunt smoke creeping energy fiending
[00:21.59]Keep your drugs i'll stick to the green and
[00:23.54]Evenings feel like night to me
[00:25.51]Think about the past 
[00:26.19]Sit down and breathe 
[00:27.49]Meditation helps to those with hopes of finding their infinity 
[00:31.48]Thoughts so dreamy cloudy hopes
[00:33.36]Drown in smoke to help me cope
[00:35.15]Everything i see is not real
[00:37.27]Manifested through what i feel
[00:39.94]I can help you through the sorrow and the sour thoughts
[00:43.94]Turn them into sweetness
[00:44.92]And i mean it
[00:45.44]Guide you when you're lost
[00:47.35]Everything i ever wanted was the best for you
[00:51.50]Lonely nights i contemplate will our past just Deja Vu
[00:55.15]Hopefully when you see this you'll know 
[00:57.65]That this it is a sign 
[00:59.22]That you and me were meant to be 
[01:00.98]Since the beginning of time
